how-it-works.title: SHIPPERS
how-it-works.text: Tell us where and when they want their parcel to be delivered, specifying size and weight

how-it-works.title: AYOOO
how-it-works.text: Connects shippers with travellers, making sure that everything goes according to the plan

how-it-works.title: TRAVELLER
how-it-works.text: Share where and when they are travelling and how much room they have available - in return they get paid for delivering the parcels

why-ayooo.title: FAST & CONVENIENT
why-ayooo.text: No time restrictions (even last minute!) for much less than you can find using traditional services

why-ayooo.title: COMMUNITY DRIVEN
why-ayooo.text: We are not a marketplace, we are a group of friends collaborating to satisfy a common need

why-ayooo.title: ECO-FRIENDLY
why-ayooo.text: AYOOO uses resources that are already in motion. Less emissions, less fuel consumption, less road surface wear
